enhanced_by.reason: The bind method sets up the environment and calls bindRecurse to match patterns.
The evalBind method evaluates an expression and then calls bindRecurse to match patterns.
The bindEval method binds an argument value and then calls bindRecurse to match patterns.
The apply method calls bindEval, which in turn calls bindRecurse, making it a good candidate for assertions related to bindRecurse.
The describe method provides a description of the closure, which can be used to assert the state of the environment after bindRecurse.
